WA Tools does not send your information to external servers ,they’re only on your own phone. WA Tools will also not save all notifications, only those whose applications you manually select. 1WA Tools wont work in the following cases:
Hello blank fragment 1. Remove Screen Lock so that your scheduled message can be sent when your screen is off need accessibility service to scheduled message
WA Whats Delete is a backup app. it is designed to provide backup services for your notifications using common Android APIs to achieve this. This app is not designed to interfere with other apps and services on your device. However the use of WA Whats Delete may be incompatible with the Terms of Use of other apps on your device. If this type of incompatibility occurs, you shall not use this App.
